titles.title: Optometric Fairness in Medicaid Act of 2009
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require Medicaid coverage of professional medical services of optometrists.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 7/10/2009--Introduced. Optometric Fairness in Medicaid Act of 2009 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require Medicaid coverage of professional medical services of optometrists.
